title: This Diwali, try the cool-toned smoky eye look
text: During the festive season, metallic makeup has always found a way to stay close to our hearts, and in vogue! Be it golden glam or bold bronze makeup looks, there are more than one ways to flaunt the metallic mania. This Diwali, while the world is bedazzled by the golden glory, we opt for soft, shimmery silver tones to ace the beauty game. Gold has always been our forever fave, but this Diwali we’re really feeling the silver vibe. Silver is seductive, especially when you’re going for a night-time smoky eye look. The steely iciness of silver adds the right amount of crackling touch to your beauty, and instantly turns you into a sexy, sultry vixen. Are you ready to turn on the silver shiny look? Watch this tutorial rn!
description: With Diwali just around the bend, we will teach you how to do a cool-toned smoky eye look that’ll take you from ordinary to ultra-glam in no time.
